This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS Attribute selector serialization, escaped character in attribute name 
PASS Attribute selector serialization, escaped character as code point in attribute name 
PASS Attribute selector serialization, escaped character (@) in attribute name 
PASS Attribute selector serialization, escaped character in attribute name with any namespace 
PASS Attribute selector serialization, escaped character in attribute prefix 
PASS Attribute selector serialization, escaped character in both attribute prefix and name 
Harness: the test ran to completion.
